SELECT t1.ID, t2.PILE_NUM, t1.CREATE_TIME, t1.END_TIME, t4.`NAME` AS STORE_NAME, t1.`STATUS`, t1.REAL_AMOUNT, t1.REAL_COUNT, t1.ELEC_TOTAL_AMOUNT, t1.ELEC_TOTAL_COUNT, t1.USE_OPENID, t5.RECHARGE_MONEY AS RE_RECHARGE_MONEY, t6.PHONE AS USER_PHONE, t6.OPEN_ID, t5.TYPE AS RE_TYPE, c.id as CID,c.NAME, c.FROM_DATE, c.TO_DATE, c.AMOUNT, c.STATUS as CSTATUS, c.TYPE, c.CREATE_DATE as CCREATE_DATE, c.IS_DEL as CIS_DEL FROM elec_order t1 LEFT JOIN elec_pile t2 ON t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN elec_station t3 ON t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID LEFT JOIN elec_store t4 ON t4.ID = t3.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN elec_recharge t5 ON t5.ORDER_ID = t1.ID AND t5.TYPE = 2 LEFT JOIN elec_user t6 ON t1.OPEN_ID = t6.OPEN_ID left join elec_user_coupons_rel ucr on ucr.ID= t1.COUPON_ID left join elec_coupons c on ucr.COUPONS_ID=c.ID WHERE t1.ID = #{id}

select o.ID, o.STATUS, ELEC_TOTAL_AMOUNT, ELEC_TOTAL_COUNT, o.CREATE_TIME, END_TIME, OPEN_ID,o.GUN_NO,USE_OPENID, COUPON_ID, COUPON_STATUS, PILE_ID, SERVICE_CHARGE_TOTAL_SELF, SERVICE_CHARGE_TOTAL_THIRD, BASIC_CHARGE_TOTAL, ORDER_SOURCE, REAL_AMOUNT, REAL_COUNT, SERVICE_PAY_STATUS, BASIC_PAY_STATUS, p.ID as PID, PILE_NUM, CHARGE_STANDARD_ID, FIRM_ID, p.CREATE_TIME as PCREATE_TIME,s.STATION_NAME AS PILE_POSITION, FIRM_NAME from elec_order o left join elec_pile p ON o.PILE_ID=p.id left join elec_station s on p.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID=s.ID left join elec_firm f on p.FIRM_ID=f.id where o.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select o.ID, o.STATUS, ELEC_TOTAL_AMOUNT, ELEC_TOTAL_COUNT, o.CREATE_TIME, END_TIME, OPEN_ID,ORDER_FEE,o.ELEC_PRICE, COUPON_ID, COUPON_STATUS, PILE_ID, SERVICE_CHARGE_TOTAL_SELF, SERVICE_CHARGE_TOTAL_THIRD, BASIC_CHARGE_TOTAL, ORDER_SOURCE, REAL_AMOUNT, REAL_COUNT, SERVICE_PAY_STATUS, BASIC_PAY_STATUS,GUN_NO,USE_OPENID, p.ID as PID, PILE_NUM,p.TYPE, CHARGE_STANDARD_ID, FIRM_ID, p.CREATE_TIME as PCREATE_TIME,s.STATION_NAME AS PILE_POSITION, FIRM_NAME,c.id as CID,c.NAME, c.FROM_DATE, c.TO_DATE, c.AMOUNT, c.STATUS as CSTATUS, c.TYPE, c.CREATE_DATE as CCREATE_DATE, c.IS_DEL as CIS_DEL from elec_order o left join elec_pile p ON o.PILE_ID=p.id left join elec_station s on p.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID=s.ID left join elec_firm f on p.FIRM_ID=f.id left join elec_user_coupons_rel ucr on ucr.ID= o.COUPON_ID left join elec_coupons c on ucr.COUPONS_ID=c.ID where o.ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t1.ID,t2.PILE_NUM,t3.STATION_NAME,t2.PILE_NUM,t1.GUN_NO,t2.TYPE FROM elec_order t1 LEFT JOIN elec_pile t2 ON t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN elec_station t3 ON t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID where t1.status=1 and t3.ID = #{stationId}
select ID,ELEC_TOTAL_AMOUNT,CREATE_TIME from elec_order where OPEN_ID = #{id} and STATUS in (0,1)

select t1.*, t3.STATION_NAME as PILE_POSITION from elec_order t1 left join elec_pile t2 on t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID left join elec_station t3 on t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID where t1.OPEN_ID = #{id} AND t1.STATUS=1

select t1.*,t3.STATION_NAME as PILE_POSITION,t2.PILE_NUM AS PILE_NUM,t3.CHARGE_TYPE, c.id as CID,c.NAME, c.FROM_DATE, c.TO_DATE, c.AMOUNT, c.STATUS as CSTATUS, c.TYPE, c.CREATE_DATE as CCREATE_DATE, c.IS_DEL as CIS_DEL from elec_order t1 left join elec_pile t2 on t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID left join elec_station t3 on t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID left join elec_user_coupons_rel ucr on ucr.ID= t1.COUPON_ID left join elec_coupons c on ucr.COUPONS_ID=c.ID where t1.OPEN_ID = #{openId} and t1.STATUS in (0,1) order by t1.STATUS desc, t1.CREATE_TIME DESC
limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select t1.*,t3.STATION_NAME as PILE_POSITION,t2.PILE_NUM AS PILE_NUM, c.id as CID,c.NAME, c.FROM_DATE, c.TO_DATE, c.AMOUNT, c.STATUS as CSTATUS, c.TYPE, c.CREATE_DATE as CCREATE_DATE, c.IS_DEL as CIS_DEL , eod.FROM_DATE as DFROM_DATE, eod.TO_DATE as DTO_DATE, eod.PRICE as DPRICE, eod.DURATION as DDURATION, eod.COST as DCOST,eod.SERVICE_AMOUNT as DSERVICE_AMOUNT,eod.ELEC_COUNT as DELEC_COUNT from elec_order t1 left join elec_pile t2 on t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID left join elec_station t3 on t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID left join elec_user_coupons_rel ucr on ucr.ID= t1.COUPON_ID left join elec_coupons c on ucr.COUPONS_ID=c.ID left join elec_order_detail eod on t1.ID= eod.ORDER_ID where t1.OPEN_ID = #{openId} and t1.STATUS in (0,1) group by t1.ID order by t1.STATUS desc, t1.CREATE_TIME DESC
limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select count(t1.ID) from elec_order t1 left join elec_pile t2 on t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID left join elec_station t3 on t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID left join elec_user_coupons_rel ucr on ucr.ID= t1.COUPON_ID left join elec_coupons c on ucr.COUPONS_ID=c.ID left join elec_order_detail eod on eod.ORDER_ID=t1.ID where t1.OPEN_ID = #{openId} and t1.STATUS in (0,1)

select t1.*,t3.STATION_NAME as PILE_POSITION,t2.PILE_NUM AS PILE_NUM, c.id as CID,c.NAME, c.FROM_DATE, c.TO_DATE, c.AMOUNT, c.STATUS as CSTATUS, c.TYPE, c.CREATE_DATE as CCREATE_DATE, c.IS_DEL as CIS_DEL from elec_order t1 left join elec_pile t2 on t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID left join elec_station t3 on t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID left join elec_user_coupons_rel ucr on ucr.ID= t1.COUPON_ID left join elec_coupons c on ucr.COUPONS_ID=c.ID where t1.OPEN_ID = #{openId} and t1.STATUS in (0,1) order by t1.CREATE_TIME DESC

select t1.*,t3.STATION_NAME as PILE_POSITION,t2.PILE_NUM AS PILE_NUM from elec_order t1 left join elec_pile t2 on t1.PILE_ID = t2.ID left join elec_station t3 on t2.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = t3.ID where t1.OPEN_ID = #{openId} and t1.STATUS =0 order by t1.CREATE_TIME DESC
